text.0: o soma flowing on thy way win thou and conquer high renown.
text.1: and make us better than we are.
text.2: win thou the light win heavenly light and soma all felicities.
text.3: and make us better than we are.
text.4: win skilful strength and mental power o soma drive away our foes.
text.5: and make us better than we are.
text.6: ye purifiers purify soma for indra for his drink.
text.7: make thou us better than we are.
text.8: give us our portion in the sun through thine own mental power and aids.
text.9: and make us better than we are.
text.10: through thine own mental power and aid long may we look upon the sun.
text.11: make thou us better than we are.
text.12: wellweaponed soma pour to usa stream of riches doubly great.
text.13: and make us better than we are.
text.14: as one victorious unsubdued in battle pour forth wealth to us.
text.15: and make us better than we are.
text.16: by worship pavamana men have strengthened thee to prop the law.
text.17: make thou us better than we are.
text.18: o indu bring us wealth in steeds manifold quickening all life.
text.19: and mate us better than we are.
